EN copy:
Spend with your BOC credit cards at ZALORA.COM.HK from 1 March to 30 April 2017 to enjoy:
20% off upon spending HK$300 or above by entering the promotion code 'BOCHK20' when checkout;
22% off upon spending HK$500 or above by entering the promotion code 'BOCHK22' when checkout.
ZH copy:
由2017年3月1日至4月30日，憑中銀信用卡於ZALORA.COM.HK簽賬購物，
滿港幣300元或以上，並於結算時輸入優惠代碼「BOCHK20」可專享8折優惠；
滿港幣500元或以上，並於結算時輸入優惠代碼「BOCHK22」可專享78折優惠。
EN T&Cs:
1.Offer is not applicable to any BOC CUP Dual Currency Credit Card.
2.Offer is applicable on regular priced and sale items at ZALORA.COM.HK.
3.Brand exclusions apply, please refer to http://zlrahk.com/2hnaJp7.
4.Offer cannot be used in conjunction with other offers.
5.BOC Credit Card (International) Limited and ZALORA (Hong Kong) Limited reserve the right to make final decisions in case of dispute.
ZH T&Cs:
1.優惠不適用於任何中銀銀聯雙幣信用卡。
2.優惠適用於ZALORA.COM.HK上之正價及特價貨品。
3.優惠不適用於部份品牌，詳情請參閱http://zlrahk.com/2hnaJp7。
4.優惠不能與其他推廣優惠同時使用 。
5.如有任何爭議，中銀信用卡(國際)有限公司及 ZALORA (Hong Kong) Limited保留最終決定權。

EN copy:
Enjoy 300 Asia Miles when you join as new member and shop at ZALORA!
And you can earn HKD10 = 1 Asia Mile for
every ZALORA purchases HKD300 and above.
Remember to quote your Asia Miles membership number during checkout.
ZH copy:
在此登記成為 「亞洲萬里通」新會員並在ZALORA購物時，
可享額外300「亞洲萬里通」迎新里數！
同時每次於ZALORA購物滿HKD300元或以上可賺取HKD10 = 1里。
請於結帳時註明你的「亞洲萬里通」會員號碼。
EN T&Cs:
Terms and Conditions for 300 Asia Miles New Joiner Bonus:

1.The promotion period is from 1st to 30th April 2017 (HKT), both dates inclusive (“Promotion Period”).
2.The promotion is only available to Hong Kong residents.
3.The 300 Asia Miles new joiner bonus (“New joiner bonus”) is only available to Zalora customers who successfully enroll as a new Asia Miles member through dedicated Asia Miles member enrolment site and complete 1st earning activity through Zalora (“Eligible New Asia Miles Member”). Members will not be eligible for bonus miles if they enroll through other channels.
4. Eligible New Member will receive their Asia Miles membership number upon successful enrolment . Then Member can complete 1st earning activity by spending HKD300 or above in single purchase at ZALORA and quoting Asia Miles member number during checkout. Specific terms and requirements may be applicable for Zalora. For details, please visit https://www.zalora.com.hk/
5.The new joiner bonus will be credited to the eligible New Asia Miles Member’s account 6 to 8 weeks after promotion upon member fulfilling the relevant requirements stated in Clause 1, 2 and 3 above.
6. Each Eligible New Asia Miles Member will be entitled to the new joiner bonus once only.
8.Asia Miles reserves the right to alter or terminate the promotion and amend the terms and conditions at any time without prior notice. Other Asia Miles terms and conditions apply.
9.All matters or disputes will be subject to the final decision of Asia Miles Limited.
ZH T&Cs:
額外300「亞洲萬里通」迎新里數獎賞之條款及細則：

1.推廣期由香港時間 (GMT +8) 2017 年 4月 1日至 30日，首尾兩天包括在內 (「推廣期」)。
2.此推廣只適用於香港居民。
3.額外300「亞洲萬里通」迎新里數獎賞（「迎新里數獎賞」）只適用於成功透過特設之「亞洲萬里通」入會表格登記及於Zalora首次賺取里數之新會員。（「合資格「亞洲萬里通」新會員」）。透過其他渠道登記之新會員將不符合獲取此額外里數獎賞的資格。
4.合資格「亞洲萬里通」新會員完成登記後將會收到「亞洲萬里通」會員號碼。新會員可於ZALORA單一消費滿HK300或以上及於結帳時註明於登記確認電郵上的「亞洲萬里通」會員號碼以獲得此優惠。其他相關條款及細則將適用於ZALORA。詳情請參閱https://www.zalora.com.hk/
5.迎新里數獎賞將於合資格「亞洲萬里通」新會員符合以上條款1、2及3所列明之條件後6至8星期內存入其會員戶口。
6.每位合資格「亞洲萬里通」新會員只可獲享迎新里數獎賞一次。
7.亞洲萬里通有限公司保留隨時更改或終止推廣優惠，以及修改所述任何條款及細則之權利。亞洲萬里通有限公司其他條款及細則適用。
8.如有任何爭議，亞洲萬里通有限公司保留最終決定權。

EN copy:

2. Invalid to interchange for other treatment or product, and is non-transferable.
3. LightMAC reserves the right of final decision in case of any disputes.

2. 優惠不可轉換其他療程或產品，及不得轉讓。

EN copy:
ZALORA customers can enjoy Perfect White Moisture Facial Set
with special offer $195, redeem a complimentary Brightening Clay Mask sachet,
and join Disinfection Spray Aromatherapy Workshop in any CANVAS shops.
(Reservation is required. Available while stocks last.)
ZH copy:
ZALORA顧客可以優惠價$195體驗CANVAS煥白亮肌修護套裝。
憑電郵親臨專門店更可免費獲贈煥白礦物泥膜體驗裝乙包，
及免費參與「預防流感有機香薰工作坊」乙次。
(敬請預約，額滿即止)
EN T&Cs:
1. All the above promotional offers are valid from now until 30 April 2017.
2. Offers available in all CANVAS Hong Kong shops and counter.
3. Each customer can enjoy all the above complimentary privileges once only.
4. One per customer. Available while stocks last.
5. All matters and disputes will be subject to the final decision of CANVAS.
ZH T&Cs:
1. 優惠有效期至2017年4月30日。
2. 優惠適用於CANVAS香港所有分店。
3. 每人限享以上免費禮遇乙次。
4. 數量有限，送完/額滿即止。
5. 如有任何爭議，CANVAS將保留最終決定權。

EN copy:
Use code "ZALORA10" to enjoy DOU4LA delivery services with 10% off.
Register now and get extra $20 welcome offer.
ZH copy:
立即使用代碼“ZALORA10“，以9折優惠體驗轉運服務。
經此連結登記成為新會員可獲$20迎新運費。
EN T&Cs:
This offer is only valid for new registration via this link. New DOU4LA member account should be activated before 30 Apr 2017.
Code “ZALORA10” valid until 31 May 2017.
ZH T&Cs: 此優惠只適用於經此連結註冊，並於2017年4月30日或之前激活帳戶之到貨啦新會員。優惠代碼ZALORA10有效期至2017年5月31日。

EN copy: Enjoy 18% off from Y5BUDDY, the Portable Wifi Service Rental in Hong Kong. Daily rental rate is as low as HKD22. Use Code: ZALORA18

立即使用優惠碼“ZALORA18“。

ZH T&Cs: 此優惠不能與其他推廣優惠同時使用。此優惠只適用於Y5buddy香港。顧客需於結帳時輸入有效的推廣碼方可生效。

EN CTA: Act now to register your FREE fitness pass!
ZH CTA: 立即行動登記7天免費運動通行證
EN T&Cs: Valid for 1st time visitors only. Appointment must be made in advance. Valid for 7 consecutive days only. 3 Group Classes are included. Fight Hard Fitness Limited reserves the right of final decision if any disputes.
